details.description:
The New Balance 574 Nimbus Cloud comes in white, grey, and an off-white called nimbus cloud. The shoe has a nimbus cloud leather upper. It also has white leather and mesh sections on the upper part of the shoe. The shoe also features the New Balance logo on both sides of each shoe. Finally, it has a rubber sole with a white mid-section and a black lower finish.

The New Balance 574 Nimbus Cloud was released on March 28th, 2022 and retailed at $85.

The New Balance 574 Black White is a sneaker released through the collaboration of BEAMS and New Balance brands. 

The sneaker arrives in a blend of black, light grey, and white colorway dubbed "Black White." At the same time, black makes the most of the shoe; grey hints appear on the inner lining, padded collars, and the heel unit. The upper comprises long-lasting suede and breathable mesh vamp, while an EVA chunk underfoot provides lightweight cushioning beneath. Branding detailing is enhanced by the logo patch to the sides and tongue, the heel tab, and the horizontally patterned stabilizer. Adding to the shoe’s design are a rounded toe and a flat rubber outsole.  

The New Balance 574 Black White 2022 was released on December 30th, 2021. It retailed at a price of $95.

The New Balance 574 Legacy Bodega Arrival is a collaborative sneaker from Boston-based streetwear boutique Bodega and New Balance, featuring the New Balance 574 silhouette released to celebrate Bodega’s 15th anniversary.

Dressed in Lemon Curry, Reflective Silver, and blue, this Bodega x New Balance 574  sneaker features a mixed-material upper made of breathable mesh on the toebox and tongue, a perforated suede collar, and hairy suede overlays. Lemon Curry dominates the upper, while hits of Reflective Silver on the lateral "N" logos, vamp, and heel tab and blue hues on the inner tongue and collar lining offer a contrasting tone. Other details include white laces, New Balance branding on the heel, a co-branded tongue, and red insoles with co-branded details and a 15th-anniversary celebrations graphic. The upper rests on a white and silver ENCAP midsole atop a black rubber outsole. 

Our experts particularly love this sneaker’s unique design, vibrant color scheme, the collaborative nature of its creation, which make it stylish and versatile. The New Balance 574 Legacy Bodega Arrival was made available on July 15th, 2022. Initially, it retailed at $130.

The New Balance 574 Grey White takes the iconic low-top design that first debuted in 1988 and revamps it with performance trailing running technology.

The sneaker features an ENCAP midsole, which provides cushioning with a durable rim that supports the foot. Like other 574 variations, the Grey White (2022) edition comes with a rippled outsole that grips the ground and provides additional traction. This running shoe boasts a breathable mesh base with large, suede overlays that form a lace cage. The understated colorway displays White, Grey, and Silver, but grey is the dominant tone. The branding details are minimal, including the ‘N’ on the side panel, ‘NEW BALANCE’ written across the heel, and a New Balance label on the tongue.

Our StockX experts love the way the white laces stand out against the grey-tone upper and the silver detailing on the heel and the ‘N’. The New Balance 574 Grey White (2022) was released on April 15, 2022, and retailed at $95.

The New Balance 574 Triple Black is an iteration of the New Balance 574 sneaker in a Core Black colorway.

This sneaker features an all-Black upper made of a mesh base with suede overlays on the forefoot, mid-panel, and heel. The mesh material used on the vamp, tongue, and ankle collar is made of 100% recycled polyester. Smooth, reflective material in a contrasting dark tone highlights the ‘N’ logo, upper eyestays, and heel tab. This shoe rests on a tonal ENCAP-cushioned midsole and a rubber outsole made of 5% recycled rubber. 

The New Balance 574 Triple Black (2022) was made available on January 13th, 2022. Initially, it retailed at $95.

The New Balance 574 Nimbus Cloud White (W) comes in a color palette that is somewhat lighter in hue than the brand's grey color scheme crafted in suede and mesh materials inspired by its predecessor.

The heel stabilizer and sole have been dyed monochromatically in white and dark grey. The model is covered in a faded grey. Other features include reflective "N" emblems on the side, woven labels with their customary branding, and a black typeface "New Balance" at the heel tab. Additional brandings include the NB logo and "574" text on its padded tongue.

The women's iteration of the New Balance 574 Nimbus Cloud White (W) was released on 16th March 2022 and retailed at $85.

The New Balance 574 Bodega Legacy Departure is a reimagined version of the New Balance 574 model, first released in 1988.

A product of the collaboration between Boston-based streetwear boutique brand Bodega and international sports footwear and apparel producer New Balance, this silhouette features a blue color scheme. It features reflective 3M patches at the heel, retro suede uppers, gray ENCAP-infused midsoles, a black outsole, woven logo patches on its sides, and a perforated tongue.

The New Balance 574 Bodega Legacy Departure first made its way into the market on July 15th, 2022. At the time, it retailed at $130.

name: New Balance 574 Legacy Stone Island Dark Green

details.description:
The New Balance 574 Legacy Stone Island Dark Green is part of a collaboration between New Balance and Stone Island, a luxury menswear label based in Ravarino, Italy, that reinterprets the New Balance 574 silhouette.

In keeping with Stone Island’s design aesthetic, this New Balance 574 Legacy is crafted from premium yet durable materials, including ripstop fabric and velvety nubuck. While the dark green, brown, and khaki colorway has military influences, the sneaker also incorporates design details from Stone Islands' 1980s catalog. Stone Islands’ recognizable compass logo acts as a tongue tag, while "NEW BALANCE" can be found on the heel tab, and the "N" is made from a rubberized material.

Our StockX experts like the "STONE ISLAND PRODUCT RESEARCH" lettering, which pays tribute to the research the brand puts into developing and applying high-quality materials. The New Balance 574 Legacy Stone Island Dark Green was released on June 14, 2024, and retailed for $140.

name: New Balance 574 Legacy Stone Island Light Green

details.description:
The New Balance 574 Legacy Stone Island Light Green was released as part of Stone Island's Summer/Fall 2024 collection and represents a collaboration with New Balance. It reinterprets New Balance's iconic 574 silhouette and incorporates premium yet practical materials.

Stone Island is an Italian menswear label known for researching fabrics and innovative designs. The Stone Island Light Green New Balance 574 Legacy embodies this ethos by crafting the upper with ripstop fabric in Mustard Gold and nubuck in Light Green. The overlays display the iconic New Balance "N," which uses a rubberized material. A panel on the medial side displays "STONE ISLAND PRODUCT RESEARCH," which pays tribute to the label's design process.

Our experts at StockX like the dual branding, including the Stone Island compass logo on the tongue and "NEW BALANCE" on the heel tab. The New Balance 574 Legacy Stone Island Light Green was released on June 14, 2024, and sold for $140.

name: New Balance 574 Blue Laguna Sea Salt
New Balance 574 YURT Salehe Bembury Team Forest Green

details.description:
The New Balance Yurt 574 Salehe Bembury Forest Green features a navy mesh upper with Forest Green suede and light brown smooth leather overlays. At the heel, an extended heel unit is prominent that can also be utilized as a whistle. A responsive sole enhanced with Abzorb and Rollbar technology adds the finishing touches to this nature-inspired design.

The New Balance Yurt 574 Salehe Bembury Forest Green pack released in October of 2021 and retailed for $150.

name: New Balance 574 Legacy Navy Grey Pink
